text:
Hi there, I have not heard back from anybody on the following little question that I was hoping to get a little insight on,  any and all help would be greatly appreciated!
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1736784833718599>
<@U087NPPFDHC> - I don't think this card takes in properties
I know you defined it but that's not a feature of this component
Rather than using this pre-built component, you can build one your self using standard components and serverless functions.
Maybe try the CrmAssociationPropertyList component - this does take in properties

> It will be really nice when we can provide custom actions in the action menu component <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#action-menu>
Hey Carter <@U01QVR44MEY> out of curiosity can you elaborate on why this would be helpful for you?
